channel.title: The compiler ERROR
channel.description: Hello, I have tryed to compile several times with multiple server sources... But it says I dont have jdk 5.0 or 6.0 Java...When I have jdk with even all the updates... Can someone help me? :confused: :|

item.title: The compiler ERROR
item.dc:creator: @murphy0lee murphy0lee
item.description:
@murphy0lee wrote:

look if u got java update 3 put this in ur enirmont varabiles

“PATH” put this

C:\Program Files\PHP\;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin\;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem\;

classpath put this

.;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin\;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\lib\ext\QTJava.zip

complier put this

@echo off COLOR 09 title PhoneScape Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java" server pause
hope that helps

Read full topic

item.title: The compiler ERROR
item.dc:creator: @Username Username
item.description:
@Username wrote:

I want you to use this compiler.

:: ::
:: This Compiler is under no licenses and may ::
:: be distributed freely. ::
:: ::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit
[/code]

Read full topic
